scripts.compile-es5: npm run tsc && ./node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs dst/whenable.js --compress --mangle --source-map content='dst/whenable.js.map' -o dst/whenable.min.js
scripts.compile-es6: npm run tsc -- --module es6 --outDir dst-esm && ./node_modules/uglify-es/bin/uglifyjs dst-esm/whenable.js --compress --mangle --source-map content='dst-esm/whenable.js.map' -o dst-esm/whenable.min.js
scripts.compile: npm run clean && npm run compile-es5 && npm run compile-es6
